mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET amount=#{amount} WHERE stock_no=#{stock_no}
mapper.select: select SUM(order_tot) order_tot, DATE(order_udate) order_udate from `item` i inner join `stock` st inner join `order_detail` od inner join `order` o inner join `size` si inner join `color` co inner join `category` ct where st.item_no = i.item_no and st.stock_no = od.stock_no and od.order_no = o.order_no and st.size_no = si.size_no and st.color_no = co.color_no and ct.cate_no = i.cate_no and DATE_FORMAT(o.order_udate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} group by DATE(o.order_udate) order by order_udate asc

select item_name, order_tot, color_name, order_udate, ship_stat, user_no, size_name, ship_cust, ship_addr, st.amount, o.order_no from item i inner join stock st inner join order_detail od inner join `order` o inner join size si inner join color co inner join category ct where st.item_no = i.item_no and st.stock_no = od.stock_no and od.order_no = o.order_no and st.size_no = si.size_no and st.color_no = co.color_no and ct.cate_no = i.cate_no;

select i.item_name, st.amount, si.size_name, co.color_name, st.stock_no, st.size_no, st.color_no from `item` i inner join `stock` st inner join `size` si inner join `color` co where st.item_no = i.item_no and st.size_no = si.size_no and st.color_no = co.color_no and i.item_name = #{item_name};
